description: A 35-year-old male patient presents with cough and fever. He was diagnosed with pneumonia and prescribed antibiotics. A chest X-ray was performed.
A female patient has a headache and nausea. She may need a blood test. The doctor suspects migraine.
A 30-year-old male presents with fever and cough. He was diagnosed with pneumonia and prescribed antibiotics. A chest X-ray was performed.
A 50-year-old female has high blood pressure. She takes lisinopril daily and undergoes regular blood pressure checks.
